original_text: Because he has despised the word of the Lord and has broken his commandment, that person shall be utterly cut off; his iniquity shall be on him.”
korean_text: 그런 사람은 여호와의 말씀을 멸시하고 그의 명령을 파괴하였은즉 그의 죄악이 자기에게로 돌아가서 온전히 끊어지리라

sentences.original_text: Because he has despised the word of the Lord
that person shall be utterly cut off
his iniquity shall be on him
